definition: A period of time during which an individual engages in activities related to their occupation or profession, typically lasting for several hours and occurring on a regular basis. It is commonly used to refer to a specific day of work within a larger time frame, such as a week or month.

examples.german: Am Ende des Arbeitstages war ich ersch√∂pft.
examples.english: At the end of the workday, I was exhausted.
